example.text: Biden’s petulant refusal to negotiate in good faith with a co-equal branch of government is pathetic. [[user]] has our unified support! [[url]]

From [[user]]: No one should have to pay more for health care services based only on the location of care. This bipartisan, commonsense solution prioritizes the health and well-being of patients by promoting affordability, transparency and fairness.

I’ve been to the Southern border. I've seen the disastrous impact of Biden's open border agenda. Moments ago, we passed the strongest border security measure the House has ever seen. And it couldn’t be more timely with the expiration of Title 42 tonight.
Biden’s petulant refusal to negotiate in good faith with a co-equal branch of government is pathetic. [[user]] has our unified support! [[url]]
The greatest long-term threat to our superiority over China does not even come from China itself. It comes from our exploding national debt.

RIGHT NOW: Biden and his liberal lackeys are working to deepen our ties with the WHO. Have we forgotten that the US is a sovereign nation? We must NOT continue to surrender authority to the defective WHO. We must withdraw! [[url]]

NOW: your Conservative Majority in the House will pass the Secure the Border Act. We are RIGHT UNDER THE WIRE. Title 42, one of the last tools we have to protect our border, ends TODAY. You can always count on your GOP House Majority to say NO to Biden's open border policies.
